disabled.description: Set all subform components to a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 将所有的子表单组件设置为禁用状态.

fast-fail.description: Validation is stopped as soon as any rule fails.
fast-fail.description_zh: 任何规则失败后立即停止验证。

:v-model.description: A value that represents the validity of the form. If the value is null, it means that the form has not been validated or the form has been reset. Otherwise, the value will be the boolean that indicates whether the validation passed or not.
:v-model.description_zh: 代表表单有效性的值。 如果值是 null，则代表还没有进行验证或表单已被重置。否则，值将是表示验证是否通过的boolean。

readonly.description: Set all subform components to read-only.
readonly.description_zh: 将所有的子表单组件设置为只读状态.

validate-on.type: / blur / input / submit / blur lazy / input lazy / submit lazy / lazy blur / lazy input / lazy submit / lazy
validate-on.description: Change the event that triggered the validation behavior.
validate-on.description_zh: 更改触发验证行为的事件。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event emitted when the form’s validity changes.
events.description_zh: 表单有效性更改时发出的事件。
